creator: calestyo@scientia.net
text:
Hi.

For consistency reasons, remove the trailing "/" of the directory "/home/" in the example at http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/core.html#directory.

I'm not sure whether there's and suggested way of having the trailing slash at directories or not. If so, this should perhaps be added.

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text: Thanks. Change applied to 2.2 and trunk docs.
